name: Become Your Future
description:
You are the present, the guy in the back. Your job is to blindly follow your future. Would it lead you to where you wanted to go?

Become Your Future is a motivational 2d platformer made for Cowboy's game jam under the theme "Future", It is very short and should not take more than 20minutes to complete on average. There are about 9 levels.

Controls :

  • use SPACEBAR to jump
  • use DOWN ARROW KEY or S to slide
  • use MOUSE LEFT CLICK to fire (unlocked after a few levels)

Features :

  • Tight Controls
  • Easy level
  • Short gameplay
  • Enemies
  • Motivational storyline
  • Score mechanism
  • Hand painted graphics
  • Gamepad support (not tested)

Credits :
